      • addNewReviewSummary

        public ReviewSummary addNewReviewSummary(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String relatedTo,
                                java.lang.String claimNumber,
                                java.lang.String reviewType,
                                java.lang.String reviewedBy,
                                java.lang.String subContact,
                                java.util.Calendar serviceDate,
                                ReviewServiceType serviceType,
                                int score,
                                java.lang.String abContactLinkID,
                                java.lang.String comments,
                                java.lang.String claimCenterUID,
                                ReviewCategory[] categoryScoreCategories,
                                int[] categoryScores)
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                         ServerStateException,
                                         PermissionException,
                                         BadIdentifierException
        Description copied from interface: IReviewSummaryAPI
        Adds a new ReviewSummary, and returns it.
        Specified by:
        addNewReviewSummary in interface IReviewSummaryAPI
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Review (often the same as the ReviewType)
        relatedTo - the "related to" object on the claim
        claimNumber - the claim number
        reviewType - the review type (in case "name" is being used more broadly)
        reviewedBy - (String) the user who last updated the review before it was completed
        subContact - (String)
        score - the overall score of the review
        abContactLinkID - the AddressBookUID (linkID in ContactManager) of the associated Contact/ABContact
        Returns:
        the reviewSummary
        Throws:
        ServerStateException - Thrown when a request is made at a time the server is in a state that disallows the request.
        PermissionException - Thrown when the authenticated SOAP user does not have permission to perform the requested operation
        BadIdentifierException - Thrown when an internal public ID doesn't map to a real bean (problem could be that type was incorrect)
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a communication error occurs
